languages.text: "Отнюдь, дорог{mf|ой|ая} {name}. Вопросов множество. Как вышло, что вам удалось уцелеть в схватке, в которой погибла Теодора, многократно более опытная и умелая? Является ли совпадением, что именно вам — единственно{mf|му|й} — удалось после этого вырваться из ловушки на Райкаде Минорис? Сколько правды в слухах еретика Кунрада Войгтвира, распространяемых о вас?"

"Far from it, my dear {name}. The questions are manifold. How did you manage to survive the battle that claimed the life of Theodora, who was so much more experienced and skilled than you? Is it a coincidence that you and you alone then made it out of the trap on Rykad Minoris? How much truth is there in the rumours being spread by the heretic Kunrad Voigtvir about you?"
languages.original_text: "Отнюдь, дорог{mf|ой|ая} {name}. Вопросов множество. Как вышло, что вам удалось уцелеть в схватке, в которой погибла Теодора, многократно более опытная и умелая? Является ли совпадением, что именно вам — единственно{mf|му|й} — удалось после этого вырваться из ловушки на Райкаде Минорис? Сколько правды в слухах еретика Кунрада Войгтвира, распространяемых о вас?"

Is it a coincidence that you and you alone then made it out of the trap on Rykad Minoris? How much truth is there in the rumours being spread by the heretic Kunrad Voigtvir about you?"

"Far from it, my dear {name}. The questions are manifold. How did you manage to survive the battle that claimed the life of Theodora, who was so much more experienced and skilled than you? Is it a coincidence that you and you alone then made it out of the trap on Rykad Minoris? How much truth is there in the rumours being spread by the heretic Kunrad Voigtvir about you?"

"Far from it, my dear {name}. The questions are manifold. How did you manage to survive the battle that claimed the life of Theodora, who was so much more experienced and skilled than you? Is it a coincidence that you and you alone then made it out of the trap on Rykad Minoris? How much truth is there in the rumours being spread by the heretic Kunrad Voigtvir about you?"

"Far from it, my dear {name}. The questions are manifold. How did you manage to survive the battle that claimed the life of Theodora, who was so much more experienced and skilled than you? Is it a coincidence that you and you alone then made it out of the trap on Rykad Minoris? How much truth is there in the rumours being spread by the heretic Kunrad Voigtvir about you?"

"Far from it, my dear {name}. The questions are manifold. How did you manage to survive the battle that claimed the life of Theodora, who was so much more experienced and skilled than you? Is it a coincidence that you and you alone then made it out of the trap on Rykad Minoris? How much truth is there in the rumours being spread by the heretic Kunrad Voigtvir about you?"

languages.text: 「そんなもんじゃない、親愛なる{name}よ。質問は多岐にわたる。シオドーラの命を奪った戦闘を、どうやって生き延びた？シオドーラの方がよほど経験も技術もお前を上回っていたが？お前とその仲間だけがライカド・ミノリスの罠を逃れたのは偶然か？異端者クンラッド・ボイトヴィルが広めている、お前に関する噂の中に真実はいくつある？」
languages.original_text: "Far from it, my dear {name}. The questions are manifold. How did you manage to survive the battle that claimed the life of Theodora, who was so much more experienced and skilled than you? Is it a coincidence that you and you alone then made it out of the trap on Rykad Minoris? How much truth is there in the rumours being spread by the heretic Kunrad Voigtvir about you?"

traits.locale_text: 「そんなもんじゃない、親愛なる{name}よ。質問は多岐にわたる。シオドーラの命を奪った戦闘を、どうやって生き延びた？シオドーラの方がよほど経験も技術もお前を上回っていたが？お前とその仲間だけがライカド・ミノリスの罠を逃れたのは偶然か？異端者クンラッド・ボイトヴィルが広めている、お前に関する噂の中に真実はいくつある？」

languages.original_text: "Far from it, my dear . The questions are manifold. How did you manage to survive the battle that claimed the life of Theodora, who was so much more experienced and skilled than you? Is it a coincidence that you and you alone then made it out of the trap on Rykad Minoris? How much truth is there in the rumours being spread by the heretic Kunrad Voigtvir about you?"

languages.text: “还差得远呢，亲爱的{name}，我们还有很多问题没有解决。在那场战斗中，为什么战斗经验更丰富，技巧也更纯熟的西奥多拉死了，你却活了下来？你孤身一人逃出了小莱卡德的陷阱，这真的只是个巧合吗？异端分子昆拉德·维特威尔散布的那些关于你的谣言，其中有多少是真的？”
languages.original_text: "Far from it, my dear {name}. The questions are manifold. How did you manage to survive the battle that claimed the life of Theodora, who was so much more experienced and skilled than you? Is it a coincidence that you and you alone then made it out of the trap on Rykad Minoris? How much truth is there in the rumours being spread by the heretic Kunrad Voigtvir about you?"

traits.locale_text: “还差得远呢，亲爱的{name}，我们还有很多问题没有解决。在那场战斗中，为什么战斗经验更丰富，技巧也更纯熟的西奥多拉死了，你却活了下来？你孤身一人逃出了小莱卡德的陷阱，这真的只是个巧合吗？异端分子昆拉德·维特威尔散布的那些关于你的谣言，其中有多少是真的？”

languages.text: «En absoluto, estimad{mf|o|a} {name}. Mis preguntas son muy numerosas. ¿Cómo sobrevivió a la batalla que se cobró la vida de Theodora, que era mucho más hábil y experimentada que usted? ¿Es coincidencia que usted, y solo usted, sobreviviera a la trampa de Rykad Minoris? ¿Cuánta verdad hay en los rumores que el hereje Kunrad Voigtvir propaga sobre usted?».
languages.original_text: "Far from it, my dear {name}. The questions are manifold. How did you manage to survive the battle that claimed the life of Theodora, who was so much more experienced and skilled than you? Is it a coincidence that you and you alone then made it out of the trap on Rykad Minoris? How much truth is there in the rumours being spread by the heretic Kunrad Voigtvir about you?"

traits.locale_text: «En absoluto, estimad{mf|o|a} {name}. Mis preguntas son muy numerosas. ¿Cómo sobrevivió a la batalla que se cobró la vida de Theodora, que era mucho más hábil y experimentada que usted? ¿Es coincidencia que usted, y solo usted, sobreviviera a la trampa de Rykad Minoris? ¿Cuánta verdad hay en los rumores que el hereje Kunrad Voigtvir propaga sobre usted?».

languages.text: « Loin de là, {mf|mon cher|ma chère} {name}. Très loin de là. Comment avez-vous survécu à une bataille qui a coûté la vie à Théodora, pourtant bien plus expérimentée et habile que vous ? Est-ce une coïncidence que vous soyez {mf|le seul|la seule} à être {mf|sorti vivant|sortie vivante} du piège sur Rykad Minoris ? Les rumeurs répandues par l'hérétique Kunrad Voigtvir à votre sujet ont-elles la moindre part de vérité ? »
languages.original_text: "Far from it, my dear {name}. The questions are manifold. How did you manage to survive the battle that claimed the life of Theodora, who was so much more experienced and skilled than you? Is it a coincidence that you and you alone then made it out of the trap on Rykad Minoris? How much truth is there in the rumours being spread by the heretic Kunrad Voigtvir about you?"

traits.locale_text: « Loin de là, {mf|mon cher|ma chère} {name}. Très loin de là. Comment avez-vous survécu à une bataille qui a coûté la vie à Théodora, pourtant bien plus expérimentée et habile que vous ? Est-ce une coïncidence que vous soyez {mf|le seul|la seule} à être {mf|sorti vivant|sortie vivante} du piège sur Rykad Minoris ? Les rumeurs répandues par l'hérétique Kunrad Voigtvir à votre sujet ont-elles la moindre part de vérité ? »

languages.text: "Bei Weitem nicht, {mf|werter|werte} {name}. Die Fragen sind mannigfaltig. Wie konntet Ihr den Kampf überleben, der Theodoras Leben gefordert hat, obwohl sie viel erfahrener und fähiger war als Ihr? Ist es ein Zufall, dass nur Ihr allein aus der Falle auf Rykad Minoris entkommen seid? Wie viel Wahrheit steckt in den Gerüchten, die der Ketzer Kunrad Voigtvir über Euch verbreitet?"
languages.original_text: "Far from it, my dear {name}. The questions are manifold. How did you manage to survive the battle that claimed the life of Theodora, who was so much more experienced and skilled than you? Is it a coincidence that you and you alone then made it out of the trap on Rykad Minoris? How much truth is there in the rumours being spread by the heretic Kunrad Voigtvir about you?"

traits.locale_text: "Bei Weitem nicht, {mf|werter|werte} {name}. Die Fragen sind mannigfaltig. Wie konntet Ihr den Kampf überleben, der Theodoras Leben gefordert hat, obwohl sie viel erfahrener und fähiger war als Ihr? Ist es ein Zufall, dass nur Ihr allein aus der Falle auf Rykad Minoris entkommen seid? Wie viel Wahrheit steckt in den Gerüchten, die der Ketzer Kunrad Voigtvir über Euch verbreitet?"

languages.text: "Bilakis sevgili {name}. Soruların sonu gelmez. Senden çok daha deneyimli ve yetenekli olan Theodora'nın hayatını kaybettiği muharebeden sağ çıkmayı nasıl başardın? Rykad Minoris'teki tuzaktan senin, yalnızca senin kurtulman tesadüf müydü? Kâfir Kunrad Voigtvir'in senin hakkında yaydığı söylentilerdeki gerçeklik payı nedir?"
languages.original_text: "Far from it, my dear {name}. The questions are manifold. How did you manage to survive the battle that claimed the life of Theodora, who was so much more experienced and skilled than you? Is it a coincidence that you and you alone then made it out of the trap on Rykad Minoris? How much truth is there in the rumours being spread by the heretic Kunrad Voigtvir about you?"

traits.locale_text: "Alakası bile yok sevgili {name}. O soruların sonu gelmez. Senden çok daha deneyimli ve yetenekli olan Theodora'nın hayatını kaybettiği muharebede hayatta kalmayı nasıl başardın? Rykad Minoris'teki tuzaktan senin ve yalnızca senin kurtulman bir tesadüf müydü? Kâfir Kunrad Voigtvir'in senin hakkında yaydığı söylentilerdeki gerçeklik payı nedir?"
